meanings.definition: The world or realm believed to exist after death.
meanings.sent1: Many cultures have different beliefs about the afterworlds.
meanings.sent2: People wonder what the afterworlds are like.
meanings.sent3: The afterworlds must be a busy place with all the souls there.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the afterworlds of different mythologies can be fascinating.
meanings.sent5: Legends often speak of mysterious afterworlds filled with wonders.

meanings.sent1: The afterworlds events were even more exciting than the ones before.
meanings.sent2: She was excited for the afterworlds chapters of her life.
meanings.sent3: The afterworlds party was a hit with all the guests.
meanings.sent4: The afterworlds days seemed brighter and full of promise.
meanings.sent5: The afterworlds adventures were waiting just around the corner.
